channel.title: Pages on Pete Witcher, Technical Writer
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Pete Witcher, Technical Writer

item.title: Portfolio
item.author: pete.witcher@gmail.com (Pete Witcher)
item.description: Some examples of my work You can browse some documents I wrote and co-wrote below. I also provide custom samples on request. Sample #1 - Open API documentation Most of the API documentation I’ve done is proprietary and internal-only, so I created and hosted my own simple RESTful web API. Then I documented it to provide that documentation as a sample. Tools used Python Flask SwaggerHub OAS Git/Github Heroku Atom WinSCP Sample #2 - Internal API guide This guide documents an API for monitoring and managing a 3U SSD storage device.

item.title: About me
item.author: pete.witcher@gmail.com (Pete Witcher)
item.description: I’m a technical writer with over 20 years of experience documenting retail and enterprise products of varying technical complexity. I enjoy the challenge of learning new applications and technologies, and I love writing about them to let others appreciate them as well. Before becoming a technical writer, I was a copywriter, a slot machine salesman, a call center supervisor, and I had many other jobs in my teens and twenties. I’m also an amateur musician.
